title: [RouteContext] Migrate classes/subentity/lineage.py (11 methods)
body:
## Objective
Migrate `src/domolibrary2/classes/subentity/lineage.py` to use RouteContext via `_build_route_context()`.

## Reference
Class methods should use `self._build_route_context()` to construct context from passed parameters.

## Tasks
- [ ] Update all 11 methods that call route functions
- [ ] Replace individual session/debug_api params with context
- [ ] Use `self._build_route_context()` to create context
- [ ] Pass context to route function calls
- [ ] Verify all tests pass
- [ ] Update `TO_DOS/classes/subentity.lineage.md` to mark methods as complete

## Migration Pattern

```python
async def method_name(
    self,
    param: str,
    session: httpx.AsyncClient | None = None,
    debug_api: bool = False,
    return_raw: bool = False,
) -> ResultType:
    """Docstring here."""
    context = self._build_route_context(
        session=session,
        debug_api=debug_api,
        # log_level="WARNING",  # Optional per-call override
    )

    res = await route_module.route_function(
        auth=self.auth,
        param=param,
        context=context,
        return_raw=return_raw,
    )

    if return_raw:
        return res

    return self.from_dict(auth=self.auth, obj=res.response)
```

## Methods to Update
- [ ] `DomoLineageLink_Dataflow.get_entity` (line 102)
- [ ] `DomoLineageLink_Publication.get_entity` (line 134)
- [ ] `DomoLineageLink_Card.get_entity` (line 168)
- [ ] `DomoLineageLink_Dataset.get_entity` (line 205)
- [ ] `DomoLineage.get_parent` (line 285)
- [ ] `DomoLineage.get_datacenter_lineage` (line 309)
- [ ] `DomoLineage.get_federated_lineage` (line 356)
- [ ] `DomoLineage.get` (line 418)
- [ ] `DomoLineage_Page.get_cards` (line 485)
- [ ] `DomoLineage_Page.get` (line 505)
- [ ] `DomoLineage_Publication.get` (line 554)

## Success Criteria
- All methods use `_build_route_context()`
- Context properly passed to route functions
- Existing tests pass without modification
- Optional: Add test for `log_level` parameter if needed

## Related Files
- TODO: `external/dl-remuxed/TO_DOS/classes/subentity.lineage.md`
- Implementation Plan: `external/dl-remuxed/code_review/route-context-implementation-plan.md`
